data.name: 液化物LIQUID Demo
data.detailed_description:
Do you trust your own judgment?
Intuition, experience, wisdom, reasoning
It's a collection of lies constructed from information
Human beings like liquids, constantly change the shape of their minds
Each individual is made up of all other individuals

After the Revelation moments, energy shortage, military, political and religious integration of human society.
Albert, a scholar, invented Prometheus, which can turn everything into liquid energy.
When Prometheus was complete, the public began to fear that the machine would change the existing power structure, that people at the bottom of the social pyramid might become the liquid food of the machine
Some say that the machine is made of human brains, others say that the machine is the brainwashing tool of The Bishop of the Temple , the Outran
Albert's cummer, famous female director Emma cause of death strange, detective Todd begins to investigate
Is there really a connection between these two events?


Albert raised the gun to Todd's forehead:
"you... Albert... My friend."
God fed Todd the rain of mercy
Feed the confused liquor to Albert
Feed your poor tears to Emma
So the truth dries up

This is a text puzzle adventure game based on the RM engine
The total process of the game is estimated to be a movie length
Narrative concealment. A science fiction story with many endings and many details
It's completely non-linear, all metaphors are possible clues, and the whole story is entirely up to the player's judgment
Different choices and game progression lead to different truths, and all stories can only be inferred if all details are played
However, the demo phase is currently 30-40% complete, and Emma and Albert will be unlocked later
